description: Mao, who is to continue to act as Hana in secret to everyone, has gotten her first job at a photoshoot for a fashion magazine! Struggling with posing, Mao gets advice from her classmate Ruli Tamaki, a model who is also active as the Aikatsu Planet! idol Ruli. However, the fact that she is Hana is a secret to Ruli as well...

titles.title: なんてったってアイドル☆
